CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: （a lot）很；非常；在很大程度上；在更大程度上；常常；经常；很多；许多；大量
签；阄；抽签；抓阄；命运；运气；处境；一块地；一块地皮；场地；全部；整个；全体成员；拍卖品；一批人；一组东西；（同一类人或事物的）数量；（Lot）罗得（人名）；洛特省（法国）；洛特河（法国南部的河流）

synonym.mean: 命运；一块地；一堆；抽签；份额

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通日常用词，指好的或坏的运气，尤多指好运气，有时也指成功或愉快的结局。
多指偶然的运气或终身遭受的不幸命运。
普通用词，侧重预先注定的命运，对未来命运的美好憧憬。
普通用词，指由机会或运气来决定的一种命运，如暗示一种比fate好的运气或一种愉快的未来。
指最终的，常常是灾难性或毁灭性的命运，隐含不可避免的意味。
较庄严用词，多指不幸的命运，暗示不可避免，令人畏惧和人的意志无法改变，宿命论色彩较浓。

word_group.brief_definition: 很多, 大量, 许多
远不能令人满意；极不完善
零散的东西；零星股票交易

word_group.phrase: have a lot on the ball

bilingual.source: Many can cause a lot of damage.
bilingual.target: 许多地震会造成大量破坏。

bilingual.source: A lot of animal homes are being destroyed.
bilingual.target: 许多动物的家园正在被破坏。

bilingual.source: Fires destroy a lot of forests every summer.
bilingual.target: 火灾每年夏天毁坏许多森林。

bilingual.source: A lot of today's great inventions are tech-based.
bilingual.target: 许多今天的伟大发明都是基于技术的。

bilingual.source: He gets to see all kinds of things and learns a lot.
bilingual.target: 他有机会见到各种各样的事物，学到许多知识。

bilingual.source: My grandmother has seen a lot of changes during her lifetime.
bilingual.target: 我的祖母在她的一生中见证了许多变化。

bilingual.source: I joined many different school clubs and had a lot of fun.
bilingual.target: 我加入了许多不同的学校俱乐部，玩得很开心。

bilingual.source: A lot of water is polluted and in many areas people have to walk a long way to get clean water for daily use.
bilingual.target: 许多水被污染，在许多地区人们不得不走很远的路去取干净的水来日常使用。

bilingual.source: A lot of words in text messages are written differently than in the dictionary.
bilingual.target: 短信中的许多词与字典中的写法不同。

bilingual.source: There are a lot of new buildings now, but many of the old buildings are still there.
bilingual.target: 现在有很多新建筑，但许多旧建筑仍然存在。

list.abstract: lot（英 [lɒt]，美 [lɑːt]），英语单词，作代词为许多；大量。作副词为很多地；非常。作名词为群；类；批。作动词为将……分成批组。短语搭配有a lot of（很多；大量；许多）、thanks a lot（多谢）。例句为“Older men spend a lot of money trying to avoid hair loss（老年男性花很多钱来避免脱发）”。 lot相关近义词有fate、destiny。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this is certainly a lot to think about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，还有许多事需要考虑。

yingyinNormal.en: When too many cheap mortgages were being sold in 2007, a lot of people didn't know what was going on and a lot of others just followed the crowd.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当许多便宜的抵押品在2007年被贩卖时，有许多人都不知道怎么一回事，而只是跟着大多。数人的步调。

yingyinNormal.en: There were a lot of divorce handovers at the café. Sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在咖啡店我见过许多离异夫妻交接，抱歉。

yingyinNormal.en: I notice that you've been trusted with a lot of rather important responsibilities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看到你肩负了许多重要职责。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there was a lot of action, and the story moved along at a brisk pace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 书里有许多打斗场景,情节跌宕起伏。

yingyinNormal.en: And a lot of powerful men with a desire to preserve peace and protect life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 许多掌权者都想要保卫和平，保护生命。

yingyinNormal.en: But it also leaves us a lot of trouble in particular things like envy and our happiness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但它也带来许多负面影响特别是嫉妒和我们的满足感。

yingyinNormal.en: You would want that? Well, I would want Chumhum back. That would solve a lot of my issues.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想这样吗？我想签回查查网，这能替我解决许多问题。

yingyinNormal.en: And you know, I've been through a lot in the past six days, five minutes, 27-and-a-half seconds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道，我过去6天5分钟27秒半，经历了许多事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Why didn't he fight? Why did he allow himself to be sacrificed? I ask myself that question a lot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他为什么不反抗，他为什么自愿牺牲，我自问过许多遍。

yingyinNormal.en: And also lot of the traditional business hate the Internet, because they destroy their business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而许多传统企业讨厌互联网，因为互联网毁掉了他们的生意。

yingyinNormal.en: We are the cause of a lot of those myths, but I promise my mother was just as human as you or I.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是许多神话的起源，但我向你保证我妈妈是和你我一样的人类。

yingyinNormal.en: Thirty years I've been doing this and I've seen a lot of other games come and go. Kind of sad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这三十年来我都在破坏东西我看到过许多其他游戏来来去去，有点难过。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to have someone to take Will's place anyway. Our firms are fighting on a lot of fronts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尔的位置总是要找人顶上的。我们两家律所在许多方面都有利益冲突。

yingyinNormal.en: Like this one birthday I came home from my cello lesson and I saw a lot of strange cars parked out front.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一次生日，我上完大提琴课回来，看见外面停着许多陌生的轿车。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, a lot of scientists believe that making contact with other life-forms would probably not end well for us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 许多科学家认为与其他生命体有接触，可能对人类造成巨大灾难。

yingyinNormal.en: And as poor as my family was, we still were a lot better off than a lot of your families, who not only had to struggle through poverty but had to fight racism as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我家挺穷的，但还是比在座的许多家庭宽裕不少，你们不仅要和贫穷斗争，还得和种族歧视斗争。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you thinking of joining? Both my partners are in clubs. They've drummed up a lot of business. Maybe I...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想加入吗？我的两个合作伙伴都在俱乐部里，他们招徕了许多生意。也许我……

yingyinNormal.en: You're saying you didn't blackmail them? I pressure a lot of people, Tom. That's part of politics. But never those two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说你没胁迫过他们？我曾对许多人施压，汤姆，这是政治的一部分，但从没威胁过他们。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Alex. This isn't as pretty as the front. We got nothing to hide, but the welcome wagon is a whole lot nicer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里，嘿，Alex，这里没前门那么好，我们没什么可隐瞒的，但前门的欢迎车厢比这好上许多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a large number or amount; a great deal

examination_example.sentence: But that disguises a <highlight>lot</highlight> of changes in individual countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这掩盖了个别国家的许多变化。

examination_example.sentence: Apart from the fire, the water used to extinguish it also caused a <highlight>lot</highlight> of damage to Notre Dame Cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了大火，用来灭火的水也对巴黎圣母院造成了很大的破坏。

examination_example.sentence: With such an assertion, the work was predictably greeted by a <highlight>lot</highlight> of absurd claims about "genetics determining academic success".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有了这样的断言，这项工作不出所料地受到了许多关于“遗传决定学术成功”的荒谬说法的欢迎。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a large number or amount; a great deal

examination_example.sentence: He's a really nice guy, and he knows a <highlight>lot</highlight> about cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是一个非常好的人，他也对汽车很了解。

examination_example.sentence: People spend a <highlight>lot</highlight> of time using phones and computers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们花很多时间使用手机和电脑。

examination_example.sentence: His boss has a <highlight>lot</highlight> of trust in him.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: No, I walked on and took a <highlight>lot</highlight> of pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有，我继续往前走，拍了很多照片。

examination_example.sentence: There is a <highlight>lot</highlight> of really interesting evidence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多非常有趣的证据。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>lot</highlight> of skills are needed for the job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作需要很多技能。

examination_example.sentence: Your attitude and effort count a <highlight>lot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的态度和努力很重要。

examination_example.sentence: When it comes to in-person humor, effort counts a <highlight>lot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说到面对面的幽默，努力很重要。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: One area in which we had a <highlight>lot</highlight> of rules was table manners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有许多规则的一个领域是餐桌礼仪。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Lots</highlight> of city people were poor and they were always rushing around to look for work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多城里人很穷，他们总是四处奔波找工作。

examination_example.sentence: He continued offering a <highlight>lot</highlight> of fresh water and fruit pies to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他继续向他们提供大量淡水和水果馅饼。
他的故事让我们非常感动。

examination_example.sentence: The goose was still walking around the parking <highlight>lot</highlight>, and there was another goose not far away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那只鹅还在停车场附近走来走去，不远处还有一只鹅。

word_usage.usage:
a lot of，lots of既可以修饰可数名词，也可以修饰不可数名词。
如：There are a lot of apples in the basket.
篮子里有许多苹果。

a lot相当于副词，修饰动词，意思是“十分、非常”，同very much。
如：I like action movies a lot.
我非常喜欢动作片。
